description: These colourful unicorn cupcakes are fun to serve at birthday parties but they’re also a perfect rainy-day project.
keywords: Cupcake,Seafood free,Sesame free,Tree nut free,Egg free
name: Caramel M&M's Unicorn Cones Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 180°C (350°F). Prepare cake mix according to package directions; fold in rainbow sprinkles. Fill ice cream cones two-thirds full with batter.
Place each ice cream cone in muffin cup. Bake for 18 to 22 minutes or until cake tester inserted in center of cupcake comes out clean. Let cool completely.
Divide frosting among 3 bowls; tint frosting in each bowl with pink, blue and green food coloring. Spoon frosting, alternating colors, into piping bag fitted with large star or round tip.
Pipe frosting onto cupcakes, swirling to a peak about 1 1/2 inches high to resemble unicorn’s horn. Top with M&M’s Caramel lentils and sprinkle with edible shimmer powder/ sprinkles.
